title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: Still gurgles on the Slitrig's stream, An' wee birds sing, an' lovers dream

title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: O'er Slitrig's bonnie braes, A kindly greeting I give thee For love o' them across the sea —
